Text:
When trying to write it with ImageBurn I get "Invalid or unsupported image file format!".
Does it work for anybody else?
its been downloaded 142 times at present, and still no one has confirmed the language.  Its good too see that everyone is looking after one another still!!!!!   >:p
NOT NTSC COMPATIBLE!... Is there a way to patch the ISO to work on an NTSC system???
title of dvd is ntsc. can somebody give some more information about the game?
it's not even PAL. cuz according to playasia.com, if the game works on PAL, it should work on NTSC-J, and it doesn't work on mine. so the game is probably NTSC.

for anyone still wondering it works fine in a pal 360 i burnt the pcn-dji.dvd whit imgburn 2.5.0.0 at this point in time the latest verson at a 4x speed i had no burn problems but make shure you use the .dvd file to burn it and not the .iso as the .dvd file have the LayerBreak info and yes its a english verson of the game
